description:
A childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch40360 [Ao]`s. She has a weak and sickly body, but an indomitable spirit. As a result of a tragic accident 10 years ago, Naru experienced an awakening of her latent powers as a yuta (an Okinawan word for someone who has developed the ability to communicate with the dead and channel spiritual energy). She feels some kind of admiration for the "Umikyonchu" who has protected her during the accident.
Source: ANN
name: Arata Naru
